website_summaries.verdict: The latest generation continues to set the standard for console game controllers, boasting improved grip and sturdy construction.
pros: Springier L1 and L2 buttons and much more rugged thumb controllers
Classic streamlined design that makes controller easy to hold
Matte finish atop buttons improves secure contact
cons: Internal components tend to loosen, rattle, and fail after a few months of use
Minor latency issues during fast-paced games

customer_reviews.title: For some reason these controllers from Amazon just aren't the ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason these controllers from Amazon just aren't the same as the ones from wal-mart. They're lighter, the analog sticks are so loose, no stiffness at all, they just flop around, and they all die on me within a few months. There must be different manufacturers involved here. EDIT; By die I mean they quit holding a charge for more than like 30 minutes. I have a wal-mart one that I bought when my PS4 that is a year and a half old and it's analog sticks are still nice and stiff, it still holds a 5+ hour charge, meanwhile I've gone through four of these and have no intention of ever buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: JAC_83

customer_reviews.title: Defective by design
customer_reviews.text: The left analog stick always wears out. You may not notice right away because it doesn't show in all games. In games where the left stick movement is very sensitive, certain directions will cause the character to shuffle their feet repeatedly because the controller's signal constantly shows a strong/weak press alternating. My first controller, this issue was when pressing around 1 o' clock on the analog, the second one is when I press straight to the left. I've never had so many problems with a game system's controller. Even my 360 controllers which have stick drift don't become as unplayable as these ps4 controllers do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A must controller for PC gamers!
customer_reviews.text: I first encountered the DualShock 4 controller when I was playing on my PS4 and it was great. Lightweight, great response time, love the LEDs that change colors , touchpad is also good and triggers are responsive enough for feedback. Now I switched back to PC gaming and this is great. I'm running it with "DS4Windows" which is a 3rd party app to make the DS4 controller work on Windows. It's great! you can use it either wired or wireless and charge from PC with the micro-usb cable it comes with. I played WWE 2k18, NBA2k18, COD: WWII, and South Park with it. So far- great! Highly recommend if you use controllers for PC gaming.
customer_reviews.author: prodigyland

customer_reviews.title: Won't Turn on or Chrage
customer_reviews.text: Bought a brand new controller. Opened it up upon receipt and pressed the on button, no charge didn't turn on. Plugged it into three different USB cables connected to the outlet, ps4, and macbook and no charge. Connected it to a docking stage, still would not charge or turn on. All of these methods worked with my old controller. Very disappointed. This seller is distributing defective goods and looking at the reviews this is n't the first time it's happened. Do not buy from this seller, instead go to GameStop or elsewhere and buy a controller from them.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Block

customer_reviews.text: Authentic is the best way to go! Just be careful with the joysticks. I would let mine fall on the floor and think nothing of it and leave it there, and being so careless is why I needed a new controller. In all my games the character or whatever would move on its own because the joysticks were bent / damaged in the direction of when they were sitting on the ground lifted up / down and there's no way to fix it. Now I'm much more aware and careful and it's been a perfect experience. Hopefully others can learn from my user error, you think I would have known that!

customer_reviews.text: This is the official ps4 controller and not a third-party brand's version. After years with my PS4 controllers, they wore out. Amazon had the best prices, so I purchased here. I got the camo controller, and it felt great to use initially. But then I set it down and had to feel around for it to locate it again. customer_reviews.title: Greatness awaits with this new PS4 controller!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased Red Dead Redemption 2. There's a gameplay action during some cinematic sequences where you must 'Draw' your weapon before your enemy does. The action calls for you to lightly press the R2 trigger until a meter gets full, and then complete the pull to 'Draw' your weapon. I tried this with my original PS4 [2013] controller and it wouldn't do it even though I tried multiple times. The R2 trigger was worn out, so that meant I needed another controller...and so i could advance my playthrough of RDR2 lol! The new controller works like a dream! The overall buttons and triggers feel a lot more responsive! I highly recommend this PS4 controller!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: We got a bad, malfunctioning controller

She took it out the box, charged it up, turned it on and it blinked twice and shut off. And that's all we get after spending, or should I say throwing away, nearly $50.00. I doesn't work. Period. customer_reviews.title: Looks Official, Doesn't Feel Official

Logos all look legit but the serial code sticker on back has been tampered or removed and replaced. The controller feels nice and works great except the buttons 'click' 'clunk' when pressed, not smooth. I just recommend buying from a trustworthy store and don't be lazy like me.

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED - Lasted only 11 months

This is why I don't understand why this controller broke in less than a year. According to my son, the controller does not react as it should when you press the buttons. This is unacceptable since these controllers cost so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bowie

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt charge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller in December of 2018 as a replacement for a damaged controller. Almost immediately I had issues with it. It never held a charge past 30 minutes and pretty much had to be plugged in to be used. Around March it started intermittently not charging. I am writing this review now because it has now finally stopped charging at all rendering my PS4 unusable. I am angry and frustrated at spending $45 for something that never worked properly. This will probably influence my decision on playstation versus xbox for my next console purchase. Apparently there is no recourse for me since I am past the "return window"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with a charging cable.
customer_reviews.text: My old PS4 controller had stopped charging and I bought this replacement controller thinking it was the controller itself. I tried plugging my old cable into it and it didn't charge either leading me to believe the cable is in fact the problem. Now I'm screwed because this controller doesn't come with a charger as EVERY other gamepad I've ever bought has. I'm now stuck with two controllers that don't work until I buy another cable because Sony is too cheap to include a charger with their rechargeable controller. SMH
customer_reviews.author: boogieman619

customer_reviews.title: Connects to my new Ryzen 3600 desktop PC via USB Bluetooth adapter (plugged into 2.0 port).
customer_reviews.text: Bought a USB Bluetooth adapter to connect this DualShock 4 to my new Ryzen 3600 desktop PC (MSI B550 Tomahawk motherboard), and I almost thought the DS4 was defective, until I realized that the USB BT adapter just didn't like being in a USB 3.0 port. After moving the adapter to a 2.0 port & re-pairing the DS4, all was well, & the Steam version of Doom (2016) detected the DS4 without a hitch. (As an old-school mouse-&-keyboard gamer, the DS4's gyro-based aiming beats the $#@! out of those little sticks & pads.) Looking forward to trying it in PC driving scenarios, esp. the buggy races in "Dying Light: The Following," and vehicles in "Star Wars Battlefront II."
customer_reviews.author: Chaz G.

customer_reviews.title: This new design is good...yet bad
customer_reviews.text: At some point in the last few years sony slightly redesigned their DS4 controller. This is my second time buying these newer ones. I found a few good things about it, and a bad thing as well. Pros: L2/R2 buttons/ springs were redesigned and now don't break as easy. It's now slighty easier to take apart now for repairs. There's a cool new light bar on the touch pad. (Some may find it annoying though) Cons: Just like many others have said....The left analog stick wears out way faster than the last gen DS4 controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uneven plastic and poor quality compared to others.
customer_reviews.text: I've read the reviews and was skeptical, but I placed an order for a steel black controller that was perfect. I saw the new colors were on sale, and that's when it happened. The controller received is a lot less of quality than all of my other controllers. The dark purple textured plastic on the back does not line up with the light smooth purple on the front. The plastic actually digs into my hand a bit when I hold it! You'd be better off just going to a store and getting one, these seem very hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, does not come with any cables
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a secondary/backup controller for my PS4, and to use with Steam on my PC. Works just like my original one, looks good, and has no issues. Surprisingly, it feels slightly lighter in weight than my black controller. I was also a bit annoyed that it doesn't come with a microUSB cord to charge it. A minor inconvenience, since I can just charge it with the cord from my original controller, but I can't charge both at the same time unless I buy another micro USB cable (my phone charges with USB-C, so I don't really have extras laying around).
customer_reviews.author: Madeline H.

customer_reviews.title: It's a PS4 controller...got a dud though
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as "new"...not sure what happened. Sticker on the back was rolled up on one edge and controller had the deadzone issue from the first time I used it. Cursor would randomly wander or stutter around the screen. Did the best I could with it. Relegated it to my secondary/backup controller. Issue worsened over time, to the point where it became entirely unusable after 6 months. Throwing it out now and I'm out $75 Will buy my next one at GameStop. I don't like GameStop but the price is the same and if I get another dud, it's easier to return.

It will give a light on light blue tone but you cannot use any of the buttons you just have to start a different controller and wait for the malfunction to go away. Would have returned both of them by now if I didn't wait so long to open them.
customer_reviews.author: tim david

I don't game very often so I really didn't use new controller very much maybe 10 hours on the controller (Jan-March 2020) and one day when I decided to play on the PS4 the controller developed a T1 drift which made game play for a first person shooter impossible. Unfortunately for me this issue didn't develop until after it was outside or the return window. So I'm stuck with a paperweight. I gave it one star because when it was right out of the box it worked as advertised. It is unfortunate because I really liked this controller.

I didn’t and I had the same issues as others with the battery not holding a charge and the left joystick being glitchy. This was after only 3 months of owning this. I used it pretty lightly too as I switch off with another controller. I don’t recommend it especially if you use it to play open world kind of games as you’ll see it glitch. Not sure if PlayStation is selling fake controllers as the one that came with my ps4 still works perfectly after a year.

Do not buy one of these.

customer_reviews.text: It doesn't state anywhere in the product description that this product is USED, but it is. If I wanted a used product, I could have gone to Gamestop and bought one for half the price. Save your money, don't buy this.

customer_reviews.author: Michael Troseth

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: Product received was a counterfeit controller. Weighed 206 grams, light bleed through USB port, lightbar was not flush, and buttons were not properly aligned. Seller accepted my return request. Product was delivered to seller on 7/1/2020. At $80, I expected a real Sony sunset dualshock 4 controller.
customer_reviews.author: James Watson

customer_reviews.title: Built in obsolescence?
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement purchase. Not because the old one "broke" But rather because the "old" one seemed to start disintegrating. What I mean is the plastic/rubber starts getting "tacky" The only way to "clean it up" after that is to scrub it down in 90% rubbing alcohol. That seems to work for a while but it is only a temporary fix. Buying this just to avoid the hassle. Sony! please use better more durable materials.
customer_reviews.author: P. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Defected right analog stick. Stopped working within a few days.
customer_reviews.text: Never owned such bad quality piece of technology. I only used it a couple of times and right analog stick stopped working. E.g. when I try to aim a gun the right analog stick makes the gun go all the way up and aim at the ceiling. I should’ve checked reviews before I bought it, there’s no way this is authentic PlayStation controller. I already threw out the original box because well I didn’t expect it to do that after less than a week! Will give this seller 1 more chance and order again (also apparently all the colors I want are not out of stock uh). If it will break again then I will be certain it’s fake.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: If there was a zero star I would give it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these via Amazon and suspect they are frauds. I have 1 3 year old ps4 controller and these 2 new ones. The old controller battery lasts 4x longer vs the new ones from amazon. And the USB charging port on the controller is snug on the original vs extremely loose falls off on the two new ones. These ones being sold via amazon are junk, but unfort cs not doing much to assist me at this times with workable solutions (I'm intl). You have all been warned!
customer_reviews.author: Mooo

customer_reviews.title: What voucher code?
customer_reviews.text: My controller came in a box that shows a bundle pack for fortnite which is something I didn't realize I had purchased. Cool, I guess, my fiance plays Fortnite so works in his favor. But....upon opening the box there is no voucher code to be seen anywhere. The only paper it comes with is the PS4 controller instruction manual. So...where is this code? Giving it a 5 star simply because I hadn't purchased the controller with this code in mind, but it's just a bit annoying to see it advertised for having it and then it being empty anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J.

customer_reviews.title: Luck of the draw
customer_reviews.text: These controllers are kind of a luck of the draw when ordering. The first controller I got was obviously counterfeit. The “EXT” and headphone jack sign were bright white when they should have been muted gray. The barcode on the back was a white sticker when it should have been a part of the larger identification sticker, and the Sony was slanted. The controller was lighter and the joysticks felt much cheaper than a real one. I returned the fake (midnight blue) and ordered the glacier white from the same listing, on this time, the controller was authentic. Pretty clear it’s kind of a game of luck when ordering here.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Is this refurbished?
customer_reviews.text: After about 6 months the L2 button started sticking. Now, at 7 months the left side plastic cracked. Sometimes, it doesn't work at all, until its been on the charger all day. I'm not sure if it was refurbished or what, but this is like the 4th remote I have purchased for my son, who's a small middle schooler. An off brand, corded remote that was $10 works more reliably than this "Sony" remote. There is no way my lanky little kid is strong enough to crack a PS4 remote. I had to replace the orginal remote because he spilled water on it and it stopped charging. I didn't realize how hard it would be to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: lil_delfin

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two months
customer_reviews.text: We've had a lot of controllers over the years, including 3 other PS4 controllers and this is the first one that broke. Specifically, the left analog stick is not sending a consistent signal based on the level of input. This causes characters in games to stutter and stop when they should be running. Nathan Drake has died needlessly so many times due to this controller. Doesn't seem like a knock off, but I couldn't get it in for warranty even if I wanted to as Sony's PS4 support is nonexistent at the moment due to coronavirus.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a week
customer_reviews.text: The battery on this thing drains super fast. You might get a few hours out of it at best. And a week after I opened it, the left joystick is already stuck in the "up" or "forward" position, constantly moving your cursor to the top of any screen you're on, making pause screen mapping impossible. Literally 2 days after I threw out the packaging. I thought I was being smart paying a little extra for an actual Sony controller, but I've had better luck with third party, off brand controllers.
customer_reviews.author: RogueDom

customer_reviews.title: Good PS4 Controller however...
customer_reviews.text: This controller performs like a PS4 controller should with one exception. After just a month or so of using my controller I was getting "stick drift" on the right analog stick. This is huge for anyone that plays first person shooters for example when you are trying to fire at someone and then boom your aim suddenly shoots to the left. I can see a controller getting like that after maybe a year of heavy use, but not after a month or so. For the amount of money you pay, you should be getting a higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one that came with the ps4
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just like the one that came with my ps4 pro. Battery life is good and it charges fast. The vibration mechanism seems stronger than the ps3 was. Also feels heavier than ps3 controllers. So far the big center button has not been heavily used by the games I have played (seems gimmicky). It does have a speaker and headphone jack built in. Also displays different colors at different times, like yellow when rest charging, etc. Tip of the day: extend your battery charge by going into settings and choosing dim for the lighting on the controllers.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good controller
customer_reviews.text: I like the gold color which is why I originally bought this. It also holds the charge longer than the controller that came with the system!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Another controller another drifting issue
customer_reviews.text: So did the controller and it worked okay for the first month. Then it starts drifting back. So whenever I play a game all it does is make me automatically walk backwards. And of course I'm four days short on the return. I guess this is a pretty common problem so the minute you see your controller drifting return it immediately
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Replaced the included controller
customer_reviews.text: My in-the-box controller included with the system pooped the bed about a month in. Axis drift on the right stick. Took it apart and cleaned it, per YouTube instructions, and it was still crap. Pretty pathetic for a brand new product. But these genuine Sony controllers off Amazon have worked for half a year so far. Knock on wood...
customer_reviews.author: nmh5001

customer_reviews.title: joy sticks are junk
customer_reviews.text: Have had this controller for a month and whenever playing any game the joy sticks seem to do there own thing and send my character in all different directions you can set the controller down and it will do its own thing these things are faulty and im sure why they are sold on amazon for a discounted price...I have never had this issue with controllers bought from walmart or gamestop and of course it is not returnable now and I am out a controller!
customer_reviews.author: mrsimport

customer_reviews.title: DISGRACEFUL!!!  Broke less than 3 months after purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter for Christmas, and this piece of junk broke less than 3 months after purchase! The left analog stick no longer functions correctly making game-play impossible. This item costs nearly $50.00, and this is a disgrace and an outright ripoff that should not be tolerated by consumers. If you buy this item, you will be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: HorrorMan

customer_reviews.title: Buttons stick (at frst)
customer_reviews.text: I thought buying it on amazon from the Sony store meant I'd get a genuine Sony controller. I bought this as a second controller for my PS4 Pro. I never use this controller because the buttons on the left side all stick. The fact t had a different finish than the one that came with mt PS4 should have tipped me off. I should have returned it right away. Edit: I'm updating my review to be fair. The sticking of the pad buttons has gone away with time and it is solid and on par with the controller that came with my PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: This is a genuine PS4/Sony product in original packaging. -Worth the money, works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm replacing an old controller after dropping it too many times where a key doesn't function anymore. I looked at a bunch of local places for used controllers or new ones and found that this was the price of a used one locally. Shipped fast and free for me, arrived in original packaging. Happy to report the quality is good and since it's Sony any firmware updates etc.are good to go. A tad pricey overall in my humble opinion but best deal I could find for new, name-brand product. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: You gave to cross your fingers and hope you don’t receive a controller thats already defective
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the controller the feel and everything its just that my bad experience with it is really whats got me to review it i gave it two stars because this is suppose to be a new controller yet its defective
customer_reviews.author: monster GANG.inc

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy used!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriends controller stopped working randomly and wanted a quick, cheap fix. I bought this used for about $15 cheaper than new and in the description from the amazon warehouse it mentions that the product was just missing the packaging, manual, Or possible access codes. And when I received it, it had food stains on the back, scratches, and a chunk out of one of the analog sticks. Please beware and buy it new. I have learned my lesson for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Farden

customer_reviews.title: Great color, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I was interested in this controller because I wanted something that wasn’t the typical black controller that comes with the PlayStation. Shipping was quick and easy and everything showed up in prefect condition. Out of the box this is exactly as the pictures make it appear. It is identical in size and function to any other PS4 controller, and seems to hold a charge well. Overall, I would recommend this controller. It links right up to the console and has shown zero problems. I have been using this for a few months now and would absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 48 hours of use
customer_reviews.text: Adult owned, single with no children. I bought this back in April of 2019. 3-4 times a week I use this product for a little over two hours at a time. The right analog stick started drifting up at the end of June 2019. Extremely disappointed I miss the return date. Extremely disappointed that this product failed with minimal to light use. Sure I can go on YouTube and attempt to fix this but it shouldn't have broken so soon in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new controller in November 2019 because the left stick of the controller that came with the PS4 there was no way to fix it. Old controller worked fine for about 2 years and a half. so 4 months of playing Dark souls 3, Sekiro, Bloodborne, Doom for about 5 hours a day, as you can see games that don't require the pressing of the left stick, and some Uncharted and Black Ops 3 my left stick is stuttering like crazy again. I was expecting to last longer but it looks that they don't build it like before anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Big Improvement Over the Standard DS4
customer_reviews.text: Launch model Dualshock 4 was starting to wear down so we got a new one. Compared it to the older one and it has a few welcome alterations. The rubber on the analog sticks is grippier and a lot tougher, the rubber on the old one had completely worn off. The lightbar going through the touchpad is pretty neat. It was a bit of a pain to have to look at the lightbar to see which player I was. The controller also has a matte finish, unlike the gloss finish of the original, which alleviates scratching. This should hopefully stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: James & Debbie

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite controller for the PS4!
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly. Great color scheme! Would buy again. My original controllers began to wear the rubber around the joystick heads and tear off. Recommend replacing old controllers every several years because I forgot how well the new controller worked/felt compared to my warn out controllers. Difference will be very apparent in the thumbsticks with regard to feel.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Left stick is drifting
customer_reviews.text: I bought two time this unit, one works perfectly and second one have issue since day 1. The left analog stick is drifting. Edit jun-2020 : To fix the issue you repeat few times the analog stick dance (push and turn clockwise then repeat counter clockwise etc etc). The exact step can be find on internet. Might not fix instantly but the more you do it the better until permanently fixed. Personally it is the same fix I used to do with playstation 1 controller.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mandeiro

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price. This is the second time I've purchased a controller. Ps4 controllers in general are extremely fragile in terms of the sticks. So if you drop it chances are you broke it yourself. Both my controllers started to malfunction after being dropped a few times. And most promote believe hitting it harder will fix it. That has never fixed anything. Ever. Only reason this gets 4/5 stars is because it didn't come with a USB cord. Most do so when I didn't find one I checked the details and it never said it was supposed to have one. 👍 Other then that the controller is good just don't buy it thinking you're getting the cord as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: More than likely fake
customer_reviews.text: Got it last year cause my original controller that came with the PS4 started having minor drift on the right analog so I decided to order this camo control to match my PS4, well......played like a week with it and I got analog drift on this one too except it was 10 times worse. I ended up just playing with my original controller again. I came on here cause I threw it away today and was about to order another one when I read the reviews and to my surprise i wasn’t the only one to experience this. I would just tell everyone to take the trip to target/Best Buy/Walmart etc and get a controller from there instead
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Pairs with Toshiba fire tv edition smart tv
customer_reviews.text: This is the only remote that we found works with the Amazon fire toshiba fire tv edition smart tv. You would think the shaving controller would work but noooooo that was not true. Fire edition tv smart tv was not supported. I can't seem to get Minecraft or other fun games on our tv but at least we were able to get this controller connected via "Game controllers" under device settings.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: had it for 4 months or more works perfect
customer_reviews.text: good great perfect very happy, Update ,well it worked Ok and I used it as back up only when original didt get plugged in to recharge . any how I used it less than 200 times and now it is broken keeps giving input with out me touching R stick any how its useless now ,I don't get it I bought the Sony brand as I have never had a controller fail before on every platform still work but this one expired way too soon very unhappy !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Z

customer_reviews.title: Always check items AS SOON as you get them.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth purchase of a PS4 controller. I bought this one to replace my current aging one, but didn't open it up immediately after I received it. Now a couple of months later, I open it up and it is DEFECTIVE but I'm past the point of being able to return it. Now I have a BRAND NEW controller that is defective and I have to purchase another one to replace it. I will be making the next controller purchase from Walmart so I don't have this hassle again. Lesson learned as I like to say.
customer_reviews.author: RICKandPENNY - Reviews

customer_reviews.title: OE controller that works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My old PS4 controller was extremely worn so I got this Original Equipment Sony Dual Shock controller to replace it What can I say? It works perfectly, as expected, just like the original. Good feel to the joysticks and the touch controller is nicely sensitive for powers activation on games such as Warframe I thought the L3 button (left joystick push down) felt a little more stiff than the original but no, my old one was just worn Good, comfortable feel and the different body colours make it easier to find and identify if you’ve got more than one controller
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Baller Controller.
customer_reviews.text: This thing oozes class. I cant get over how pretty it is. Its replaced my ugly black controllers. The only minor issue I have with is the color on the back- it's this really weird grandma panty color. Which is honestly fine, I mean you see the front of the controller when using it, not the back. Besides that one point everything else is fantastic. Its smooth, feels good in the hand, and the center touchpad is responsive and better then the first gen ps4 controllers. Honestly the best color scheme they have.
customer_reviews.author: Minno Durkin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works like any other official DS4 controller. I also point out that this listing is THE ACTUAL OFFICIAL LISTING. There are a lot of other listings for the older release of this guy. The orange is BRIGHT orange which as a fan of the color is fantastic. Good luck losing this thing, haha. The secondary color is dark blue. It is not purple. When I originally heard about this controller people were saying that the "sunset" was represented with a purple secondary color but that's not true, it's dark blue. Think the Broncos american football team or DBZ Goku.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty, but don't fall for it. It's fake. Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: The X button was hard to click and my character kept turning left while trying to run straight. I looked up ways to tell a fake DS4 controller and this controller had everything. Button being hard to click, can't see the speaker through the front speaker hole, says 'Sony Computer Entertainment'(fake) instead of 'Sony Interactive Entertainment'(Real) on the back sticker, etc... Sent it back through Amazon and was quickly given a refund, and told to read the reviews before buying a product.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a POS. After I recieved, it took a couple of weeks to get a charger. A charging cord is not included and using anything other than a official charging cord is discouraged. Plugging into the charger revealed it wasn't capable of charging at all. I've checked their website and all the relevant self-help videos to no avail. Unfortunately the original packaging went out with the recycling weeks ago, so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Houghtby

customer_reviews.title: Analog sticks died within a month.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if these controllers are fake or what. I loved the color red, but this controller became unusable just after the 30 day return policy ended. dead zone was way off, characters were just moving on the own in one direction and looking all over the place. I have the white PS4 controller from years ago and that still works perfectly! Either these are fake or Sony has really started cutting corners!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect; red color = easier to find when misplaced
customer_reviews.text: I was in a hurry to get this for my son for Christmas, so I didn’t pay much mind to the reviews regarding the potential counterfeit problem. I’m going to update if I discover any signs it may be so, and /or something goes faulty anytime soon. Anyway, so I got this for my son for Christmas so he’d have a second controller and I could play with him. It looks just as described, I’m so hoping it’s legit. Also, the red color makes it easier for me to locate around the room when misplaced every so often.
customer_reviews.author: ☆Chelsea Niteshades

customer_reviews.title: Excellent controller
customer_reviews.text: I won't waste time reviewing this as a controller. It's an official PS4 DualShock so it's as good as any other official PS4 DualShock (though I'll mention that it's a V2, if that isn't already clear). What I will talk about is the aesthetic of its particular color scheme. I bought this for my son because his favorite colors are blue and orange. This was a perfect choice. The orange is vibrant and the blue is much bluer than the purple-ish blue that it appears to be in a lot of screenshots and stock images. If these are colors you like, you won't be disappointed with this controller.
customer_reviews.author: Jasyn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered this about 3 months ago and it stopped working about 3 weeks in. Amazon sent me a replacement no big deal. I get the replacement send back the other and no charge great. Replacement stops working I repeat the process 3rd controller arrives and just stopped working cant get another one. Other controllers friends controllers work these 3 in less than 3 months all had the same problem. I am not rough and I even put them back in the box when im done to prevent dust exposure. Severely unhappy. Wont order another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Jackson

customer_reviews.title: FAKE, STAY AWAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery quality is not up to Sony standards buttons are also stiff and non responsive. The main way you can tell that this controller is that when you plug it in to charge the button that lights up does not smoothly transition between colors and often jumps around between random colors. Battery did not even last 2 months and now it is only good as a wired controller. It only lasts long enough to run out the warranty. I cannot believe that Amazon is selling this and this is something that you should 100% stay away from!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey mason

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST THING I EVER PURCHASED THIS YEAR.
customer_reviews.text: Feels sub standard, makes a click when you move the joystick to both extreme left and right and makes gameplay very uncomfortable and sometimes I have to tap a button twice before they respond. The worst thing I spent my money on, I dont like it at all. My older controller of 2+yrs which I have continued to use, can last hrs and hrs before I need to charger it and even once low battery message pops up it can last a whole game or even 2, but this one doesn't last more than 1hr and dies almost immediately after the low battery message pops up.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: The new version of the Dualshock 4 is more durable than the old model
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best for all kinds of games. I gave it 4 out of 5 stars, because they are not durable like their predecessors on PS1,2 and PS3 ... I have damaged 2 controls, one of them was the previous version of the Dualshok 4 and the other the new version. The new model lasted much longer with the same use. The new version lasted 3 more months playing the same games. That's why he decides to buy the new version of Dualshok 4.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies quickly. Doesn't want to connect. Sometimes not at all. I have to let the battery die just to try again. This is supposed to be a Sony official product. What kills me more is the fact that I'm going to have to pay more to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: epictothe4th

customer_reviews.title: Black controller works great, not sure of others
customer_reviews.text: The black controller was not a knock off. This controller arrived in the same style box that my ps4 came in, along with all of the buttons clicking the exact same way as my original controller did. I looked up 4 different videos on how to spot a knock off controller and this controller did not meet any of the items in the list. If not, you may want to consider ordering from another source. My controller works great, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, solidly made.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Playstation 4 controllers, unlike other console controllers, will not mention other brands, the Playstation 4 controllers are very well made and have a solid feel to them. Vibration on them is not-comparable to any other controller I have used, it is simply better in this regard on vibration feedback. Controller speaker works well, headphone jack is outstanding for a individual headset and the controllers are simple to recharge as well. I bought the Red controller and love the bright red color on it, as it is easy to find on the nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Fake controller
customer_reviews.text: Bought the sunset orange controller and it is fake not an authentic PS4 controller. It is lighter than an authentic one, has different screws, packaging. Returned the controller. Be careful when buying the controllers especially when paying over original retail for them. This was sold by a third party but fulfilled by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RevSmokey

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for the first week or so, now having headset notifications randomly
customer_reviews.text: Had for a few weeks now. I just threw away the box a few days ago, but once I did of course there was an issue. Randomly this controller has been popping up notifications like a headset is being plugged in, says no microphone available. So I'm sure there's a wire loose or something inside. So I'm sure this will be an issue at some point. It's already annoying, but I can't wait till this happens when playing COD. customer_reviews.author: Professional Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Poor QA/QC. New controller doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second controller for my PS4 and never used it until the other day when my primary controller ran out of battery. Only then did I discover that the square button doesn't even work! I had this thing sitting around for three months untouched so now I can't return it or exchange it. product_meta.title: DualShock 4 Wireless Controller for PlayStation 4 - Jet Black
product_meta.description: Color:Jet BlackThe DualShock 4 Wireless Controller features familiar controls, and incorporates several innovative features to usher in a new era of interactive experiences. Its definitive analog sticks and trigger buttons have been improved for greater feel and sensitivity. A multi touch, clickable touch pad expands gameplay possibilities, while the incorporated light bar in conjunction with the PlayStation Camera allows for easy player identification and screen adjustment when playing with friends in the same room. The addition of the Share button makes utilizing the social capabilities of the PlayStation 4 as easy as the push of a button. The DualShock 4 Wireless Controller is more than a controller; it's your physical connection to a new era of gaming.
feature_bullets: The feel, shape, and sensitivity of the dual analog sticks and trigger buttons have been improved to provide a greater sense of control, no matter what you play
The new multi touch and clickable touch pad on the face of the DualShock 4 Wireless Controller opens up worlds of new gameplay possibilities for both newcomers and veteran gamers
The DualShock 4 Wireless Controller features a built in speaker and stereo headset jack, putting several new audio options in the player's hands

The Dualshock 4 wireless controller can be easily recharged by plugging it into your PlayStation 4 system, even when in rest mode, or with any standard charger using a USB cable (type A to micro B sold separately)
